name.ja: <ruby>近<rt>きん</rt></ruby><ruby>燐<rt>りん</rt></ruby>のフィアーマ

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Increase this card's Level by 3 until the end of this turn. Then, you can add 1 "Sparkhearts Girl" or 1 "I'm Having Trouble with My Fields Being Destroyed!" from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, you can only attack with FIRE Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters.
